Module roborallyGUI
Package networking

Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
networking.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
Chat Server This class represents a server that allows users to chat and play the game "Roborally" together.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Server's main method A server is initiated and a connection with the socket is established.
      Parameters:
      args - : -p PortNumber

    • run

      public void run()
      run(): The method creates a server socket with the given TCP-Port and waits for clients to establish a connection. Once the connection is established, a dedicated socket and a thread are created for the client. The Thread is then connected to the dedicated socket to enable the client to communicate with the server and the server to continue hearing on the server socket.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • sorryRequestRefused

      private void sorryRequestRefused​(java.net.Socket socket, java.lang.String str)
      sorryRequestRefused(): sends an error message to the user trying to connect to the server if his connection can't be accepted (game's on or max capacity)
      Parameters:
      socket -

      public void addUser​(int id, PlayerThread playerThread)

      playerThread - : the player's thread.

      public void checkWelcome​(org.json.simple.JSONObject body, PlayerThread player)
      checkWelcome(): checks user's welcome messages and gives a corresponding response
      Parameters:
      body - : is the message body fetched by PlayerThread from the user's welcome JSON file or an error message and ends communication

    • informPlayer

      public void informPlayer​(PlayerThread player)
      informPlayer(): sends the PlayersAdded and PlayerStatus msgBodies containing the figures ids, and status of all players who connected to the server before "player". If a racing course has been set, the player will also be informed
      Parameters:
      player - : Player's Thread requesting the messages

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast​(java.lang.String type, org.json.simple.JSONObject message, PlayerThread excludedUser)
      broadcast(): broadcasts a message to all users
      Parameters:
      message - : message to be sent
      excludedUser - : the thread of the user who sent the message

    • chatWithUser

      public void chatWithUser​(java.lang.String type, org.json.simple.JSONObject message, int id)
      chatWithUser(): sends a message to a selected user
      Parameters:
      type - : type of the message (here: "ReceivedChat")
      message - : message to be sent
      id - : id of the user to which the message was sent

    • selectDamage

      public void selectDamage​(org.json.simple.JSONObject msgBody, PlayerThread player)
      selectDamage(): puts the selected damageCards into the discard Pile and adds them to the drawDamage List, so the JSONObject "drawDamage" can be sent to the Client
      Parameters:
      msgBody - of msgType "SelectDamage"
      player -

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      startGame(): Starts the game

    • timerEnded

      public void timerEnded()
      timerEnded(): broadcasts a JSONObject containing the ids of the players who haven't finished selecting their cards before the timer ended. The method is called from the SandTimer class once the timer ends.
